text: Krokus is a hard rock band from Switzerland. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Krokus (1976) * To You All (1977) * Painkiller / Play It In Metal (1978) * Metal Rendez-vous (1980) * Hardware (1981) * One Vice at a Time (1982) * Headhunter (1983) * The Blitz (1984) * Change of Address (1986) * Heart Attack (1988) * Stampede (1990) * To Rock or Not to Be (1995) * Round 13 (1999) * Rock the Block (2003) * Hellraiser (2006) * Hoodoo (2010) * Dirty Dynamite (2013) * TBA (2015) Category:Heavy metal bands Category:Hard rock bands Category:Swiss musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 1974 Category:1974 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Switzerland Category:1970s music groups Category:1980s music groups Category:1990s music groups Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups
title: Krokus
